availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, shoemaker. Native of Ireland. Married to Susan Dougherty. Father of Margaret Dougherty, Mary Dougherty, John Dougherty, Charles Dougherty, Lizzie Dougherty, and William Dougherty. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1860. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1861. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 274.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 8, p. 120B-121A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994041, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 235.
Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 74.
Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1864 (Louisville: L. A. Civill, 1864), 137.
